thread.title: I LOVE The Palm in Paris!!! GREAT Location!!! GREAT View!!! GREAT Staff!!!
thread.title_full: I LOVE The Palm in Paris!!! GREAT Location!!! GREAT View!!! GREAT Staff!!! - Review of Hotel Palm - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Leo P
title: I LOVE The Palm in Paris!!! GREAT Location!!! GREAT View!!! GREAT Staff!!!
text:
You can not beat the location of The Hotel Palm in Paris. It is an easy 5 minute walk to Cadet which will zip you to the Louvre in no time; or Notre Dame de Lorette which will zip you to Pigalle or Concorde in a flash.
Bus #42 will take you directly to the Hotel from Gare du Nord; and from the Palm on to the Eiffel Tower.
The Staff (Slim, Eva, Emily, Faisel & Siddick) were all very helpful to us. They all speak English fluently.
There are excellent restaurants, cafes and Holes in the Wall all around The Palm; and if you get a craving for a cheeseburger just walk through Passage Briare.
The Palm provided the best breakfast that we had in Europe.
We are already planning our next vacation at The Palm in 2018.
Room Tip: Jus ask Slim. He will get you the best view available. See more room tips
